tool_description: The Soleo Local Search API provides access to over 15M local businesses and the highest monetization of your search traffic. The company’s proprietary platform utilizes location-centric search algorithms to best match a user’s request with the most relevant businesses nearby – these searches take business category, business location, and past ad performance into account to find the right match for the user. It also provides access to a large inventory of sponsored advertisements. By blending targeted ads with other local business listings, application developers can monetize their apps through advertising and still provide users with a true set of search results.
name: Local Search
title: Local Search

api_list.name: /businesses

optional_parameters.name: Keyword
optional_parameters.description: A term to search against business names and categories.

optional_parameters.name: City
optional_parameters.description: The name of the city to use as a search point.

optional_parameters.name: State
optional_parameters.description: The two-letter abbreviation of the state in USA to use as a search point.

optional_parameters.name: PostalCode
optional_parameters.description: The US postal code of a location.  ( 5 or 9 digit)

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category that defines (or relates to) the commercial offering of a business.
